meta-review.comment: Paw Patrol World is a playful and delightful adventure through Adventure Bay and beyond, perfectly tailored for the young gamers. With graphics and voice acting that mirror the TV series, the game offers a safe and enjoyable environment with easy-to-handle controls, allowing kids to immerse themselves in the world of PAW Patrol. Whether playing solo or in split-screen mode, the game is sure to bring joy to fans of the show.
